revised_title: Investigating the Structure and Formation Mechanism of Platelets in Type Ia Diamond
tldr: The author investigates the structure and mechanism of formation of platelets in natural type Ia diamond using electron optical techniques. They determine the displacement field of the platelets, which leads to a suggestion for the possible structure of the platelets. The study provides insights into the nature of these platelets, which are still in doubt due to their irregular structures and unclear chemical composition.
